revised_title: Geographical Situations and Longitude Determinations of the Three Presidencies in East Indies
tldr: The author discusses the importance of accurate geographical information for navigation and general geography. They analyze the longitude and latitude of the three presidencies in India (Calcutta, Madras, and Bombay) using various methods, including observations of eclipses of Jupiter's satellites, lunar observations, and correspondent observations at Greenwich. The author provides detailed results and calculations for each location, highlighting the significance of these findings for understanding the geography of the region.
